revised_title: The Existence and Nature of Auriculo-Ventricular Connections in the Heart
tldr: The author investigates the existence and nature of additional connections between the auricle and ventricle in the heart, beyond the well-known auriculo-ventricular bundle. They describe neuro-muscular structures found in the connective tissue between the auricle and ventricle, which may play a role in the cardiac conduction system.
